title: Transportation: Train (Usefulness 6)
description: Traveler usefulness 6/10 phrases for the Train subcategory within Transportation. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: While local trains are all non smoking, some bullet trains have a few cars where smoking is allowed.
cards.romaji: Zairaisen ga subete kin'en nanoni taishi, shinkansen niwa kitsuen shary. ga aru b i ga arimasu.
cards.japanese: 在来線がすべて禁煙なのに対し、新幹線には喫煙車両がある場合があります。
